name: David Kun
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page! ###
----------------------------------
If you're interested, visit my [GitHub profile](https://github.com/davidkun) or my [LinkedIn profile](http://www.linkedin.com/in/davidwkun/). 

## Github Projects ##
----------------------------------
* [HyperSpectral Matlab Toolbox](http://davidkun.github.io/HyperSpectralToolbox/)
* [Multi-Agent System Simulation](http://davidkun.github.io/MAS/)

## Other Projects ##
----------------------------------
* [GPS/INS Integration](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8Co4BjcQkU0VF84d1VKZWpxNjA/edit?usp=sharing)
* [Nonlinear Control of Inverted Pendulum-Cart System](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8Co4BjcQkU0NzlZQmxieHNJUzg/edit?usp=sharing)

### About Me ###
----------------------------------
I'm an Aerospace Engineering Master's student at Purdue University in West Lafayette, Indiana. I like the concept of open-source projects, so any programming content that I can legally upload for the community -- I'll gladly do that. 

![](https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/005/033/12a/2fdbfe7.jpg)

Hope you enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
